data.comment: The first-half is under way at Estadio Beira-Rio - Internacional kick-off to start the match.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Can Fluminense capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Free kick Fluminense.
Lucca is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Lucca is back on his feet again.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Internacional in the half of Fluminense.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Internacional throw-in in Fluminense's half.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 12, Nonato (Internacional) gets booked by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Internacional have a dangerous throw-in.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Mauricio is on target to give Internacional a 1-0 advantage.
Throw-in Internacional.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto Alegre to check on Rodrigo Dourado, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 17, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Danilo Barcelos for Fluminense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fluminense.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Uendel is booked for the home team.
Danilo Barcelos is back on the pitch.
Rodrigo Dourado has recovered and rejoins the match in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 25, Fluminense drive upfield and Yago Felipe gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Internacional defender.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fluminense's Nene misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fluminense.
In the minute 30, Free kick Fluminense.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Internacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
In the minute 32, In Porto Alegre Internacional attack through Ze Gabriel. The finish is off target, however.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
Fluminense's Yuri Lima gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 33, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Internacional a goal kick.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
In Porto Alegre, Wellington Silva of Fluminense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In the minute 39, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Fluminense's Danilo Barcelos has been booked in Porto Alegre.
Digao (Fluminense) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 44, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Internacional.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio Beira-Rio the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Internacional's Mauricio gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fluminense defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Internacional in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Yago Felipe for Fluminense has been booked by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
Caio Vidal is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira blows to start the second-half. Fluminense with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Yago Felipe.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Throw-in Fluminense.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Internacional.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 51, Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Andre (Fluminense) has replaced the possibly injured Yago Felipe at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 53, Internacional needs to be cautious. Fluminense have an attacking throw-in.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Internacional's Caio Vidal looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Internacional are coming forward and Nonato gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 57, Goal! Lucca levels the match at 1-1.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Internacional.
In the minute 60, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Internacional.
Thiago Galhardo for Internacional is whistled offside.
Marcos Guilherme is on a sub for Nonato for Internacional.
In the minute 62, Johnny is replacing Rodrigo Dourado for the home team.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 64, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 66, The away team replace Lucca with Luiz Henrique.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a throw-in for Internacional, close to Fluminense's area.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 73, Thiago Galhardo for Internacional drives towards goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Internacional in Porto Alegre.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Internacional close to the penalty box.
The away team have replaced Nene with Caio Paulista. This is the third substitution made today by Odair Hellmann.
In the minute 76, Fluminense make their fourth substitution with Felippe Cardoso replacing Wellington Silva.
In the minute 78, Fluminense have a goal kick.
Can Internacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Goal! Caio Paulista gives Fluminense a 1-2 lead in Porto Alegre.
Marcos Paulo with an assist there.
In the minute 82, Caio Paulista (Fluminense) has received a yellow card from Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Abel Braga is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Beira-Rio with Andres D'Alessandro replacing Mauricio.
In the minute 85, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional make their fourth substitution with Yuri Alberto replacing Caio Vidal.
Edenilson (Internacional) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 86, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Fluminense a goal kick.
The match at Estadio Beira-Rio has been interrupted briefly for a check on Muriel, who is down injured.
Muriel for Fluminense is back on the field again.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Internacional.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Internacional are pushing forward but Johnny's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Fluminense throw-in in Internacional's half.
Throw-in Internacional.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Fluminense.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Felippe Cardoso of Fluminense gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
That's full-time at Estadio Beira-Rio. The final score is 1-2.
